attributes.action: Stop the Proposed Modification to Vehicles Ban
attributes.additional_details:
We wish to have the proposed plans stopped

REGULATION OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL
on periodic roadworthiness tests for motor vehicles and their trailers and repealing
Directive 2009/40/EC

- The Revenue brought into our uk Economy from aftermarket parts is in the 100 millions, this would be lost

- No Modified car market = no Modified car business = thousands of job losses = more unemployed

- The amount of Tax payer money which would then have to be drawn, along with this multi million loss, to enforce these laws would be near equal to that lost

- Thousands of UK citizens would no longer have the ability to enjoy the way of life that is modified car scene

- Sales of new vehicles could drop as people do not want to have the same as everyone else, hence this market started
